title: Google organizers!
text: Convenient and easy way to get information and communicate!!

title: Gmail
text: I really like the format that is displayed. Easy to navigate and organized

title: Notifications
text: Everything is good but I cannot see the previews on my notifications. It only shows yiu have got a new message even if my previews are always on in the settings. I am using iPhone 15 pro max.  Please help me with this.

title: Needs Improvement
text: The app is not good at discerning which folders the emails should go in. So I get a significant amount of junk mail in my primary folder. And there’s no intuitive way to train the app to correct it in the future. I also wish they would add a Select All feature in the folders. It’s very tedious to select every email in the Promotions folder one by one, when I’m cleaning it out.

title: I can’t choose a file from files today
text:
Great app.  But i am not able to choose from files when I click on select attachment 
Please fix

title: Thank God for this App
text: The phone has become part of us, everywhere we go it’s with us. This App has made my bible readily available. This App has nearly all translations and very user friendly! I can download and read my bible offline. Great app!

title: For the love of God….
text:
…please, please add the ability to change the text color while composing e-mails as well as send use distribution lists created in the website version. These are basic features that I would expect from Google.

Thank you!

title: Mailbox is full
text:
Mail Time lyrics

Here’s the mail it never fails, it makes wanna wag my tail, when it comes I wanna wail: MAIL!!!!

We just got a letter, we just got a letter, we just got a letter, I wonder who its from?

title: New Update Ruined Notifications
text: The newest version of this app changed how notifications are presented. Instead of showing a preview of the email that was received, it just says “You have a new message”. Please bring back previews.

title: "You have a new message"
text:
Every email I get is labeled that and it's so annoying. I tried changing it in settings but couldn't find a specific setting to change to preview my emails. If this is going to stay like this I might as well turn notifications off. I need to see my email previews for work and "you have a new message" is doing nothing for me. 

This updated yesterday and I've had this problem ever since. 

PLEASE FIX THIS.

title: Love it
text: Would love 2 try one

title: Could use work
text: Overall a great app but support has no number and they have not responded to emails about account recovery

title: New bugs are frustrating
text: Seemingly with the last update in March 2024, new bugs have been introduced. My Inbox widget broke and was completely blank, though tapping it would still take me to my inbox. A restart of my phone and replacing the widget fixed it from being blank, but now the emails shown on the widget don’t update. Additionally, the banner notifications for new emails suddenly don’t show a preview, they just stare that I have a new message. This is despite my settings allowing previews. I'll try another restart of my phone and reinstall of the app, but the bugs are making an otherwise great app frustrating. Hopefully the team fixes the bugs soon so I can make this a 5-star review.
